metadata.title: USN-4597-1 -- mod_auth_mellon vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Fran√ßois Kooman discovered that mod_auth_mellon incorrectly handled cookies. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a Cross-Site Session Transfer attack. (CVE-2017-6807)  It was discovered that mod_auth_mellon incorrectly handled certain requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to redirect a user to a malicious URL. (CVE-2019-3877)  It was discovered that mod_auth_mellon incorrectly handled certain requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to access sensitive information. (CVE-2019-3878)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4597-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapache2-mod-auth-mellon - 0.12.0-2+deb9u1build0.16.04.1 No subscription required
